title: In-Flight Wi-Fi: Staying Connected in the Clouds
text:
In-Flight Wi-Fi: Staying Connected in the Clouds Posted Today 
How much do you prefer to remain connected while travelling by plane? 
A recent survey, commissioned by Icelandair, of American adults who have used Wi-Fi at least once in the last 12 months, revealed: 
66% are influenced by Wi-Fi availability when booking flights 
22% deliberately paid more for a flight knowing Wi-Fi would be available 
45% of people are “willing to go through TSA security twice” in exchange for more reliable in-flight Wi-Fi. 
Would you give your confirmed flight ticket for a standby ticket on a flight that had faster Wi-Fi? We found 29% of people would! See more interesting facts in the infographic below:
